47.label: What is the main sequence lifetime of the Sun?

48.labelPre: We can estimate the age of the Sun with equations that use the Sun’s mass and our understanding of nuclear fusion processes. We also know from observations of other star- forming systems that the rocky objects in the Solar System formed at the same time as the Sun.
